Email Conversation Export
=========================

ID: C1Y5AA8_00
From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-04-14 13:31
Subject: Creating Impact:1M Meals, Final day to set your goals, GUESS x Eva Beach House, Adolfo Dominguez Sale, Update your Linkedin
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/1e847a7c0300765ff6ce53e16727a65c221262054.gif> 	

This Ramadan, we proudly fulfilled our annual promise of delivering 1 million meals to those in need, collaborating with authorised NGOs across the region to ensure meaningful impact.

With the incredible support of our brands and 1,615 dedicated volunteers, we activated 31 initiatives and contributed over 3,400 hours to serve communities across the UAE, KSA, Kuwait, Qatar, Bahrain, Egypt, and Jordan. From packing Ramadan kits and distributing meals in labour camps, to hosting Iftars with People of Determination students and cancer patients, and Eid shopping for orphan children, we came together with purpose, compassion, and unity.

A heartfelt thank you to everyone who made this possible. 
Together, we created impact this Ramadan.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png>

chunks.text:
With the incredible support of our brands and 1,615 dedicated volunteers, we activated 31 initiatives and contributed over 3,400 hours to serve communities across the UAE, KSA, Kuwait, Qatar, Bahrain, Egypt, and Jordan. From packing Ramadan kits and distributing meals in labour camps, to hosting Iftars with People of Determination students and cancer patients, and Eid shopping for orphan children, we came together with purpose, compassion, and unity.

A heartfelt thank you to everyone who made this possible. 
Together, we created impact this Ramadan.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

FINAL DAY to set your 2025 Goals!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/ca95451c9e34bf3c2623902ed8e3b7731910643872.gif> 	

Upload your goals in DRIVE by 15th April. After this date, the system will be locked and you will be unable to add your goals.

Need assistance? Visit the Performance Management page <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=720&user=10620>  for FAQs, guidance and resources to help you set goals in alignment with the Group’s objectives.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-5-min.png> 	

GUESS takes over Eva Beach House

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=721&user=10620>

<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-5-min.png> 	

GUESS takes over Eva Beach House

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=721&user=10620> 	

GUESS takes over this iconic beachfront destination on The Palm West Beach in Dubai, transforming it into a chic, sun-kissed paradise. From exclusive sunbeds and cabanas to stunning sea views and signature cocktails. Join us for a stylish, vibrant experience with live music, DJ sets, and Mediterranean-inspired dining. Eva Beach House is the perfect spot to unwind in true GUESS style.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

Adolfo Dominguez Sale is Here

Don't miss up to 30% off at the Adolfo Dominguez sale! Visit us at our Dubai Hills Mall and MOE stores to shop elegant pieces. Valid until April 24th.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/67fcc25c2dc11977032654.jpeg> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/487614c42abf7256b2160da5bdbbb60f1884915450.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=722&user=10620> 	

UPDATE NOW <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=722&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/487614c42abf7256b2160da5bdbbb60f1884915450.png>
